Text: FREE Gift with Purchase of ENTHUSIAST ESSENTIALS Order online or call Use code EA at checkout If the links in this email do not function please go directly to wwwwineenthusiastcom Please remember to use code EA at checkout to receive this promotional offer GIFT GIVING MADE EASY EuroCave The Worlds Finest Wine Cellar Click here UMTaspA FREE GIFT with a purchase of or more Receive a set of Spiegelau Tasting Stems Valued at Our way of saying Thank you and Happy Holidays Offer expires A GIFT FOR EVERYONE ON YOUR LIST Holiday Accents for the Home Click here UMTaspA Corkscrews from A to Z Click here UMTaspA Gifts for the Wine Lover Click here UMTaspA Dress in Wine Style Click here UMTaspA Laguiole Gifts Click here UMTaspA MiniCellars Click here UMTaspA This offer may not be combined with any other offer and expires Due to limited inventory the free gifts will be given away on a first come fist serve basis Other items may be substituted if inventory is depleted If you have any questions please contact customer service at You are receiving the email because you have subscribed to Enthusiast Essentials If you would like to remove yourself from this list please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Thank you
